page.title: 07Norwegian Band in Dedham
page.content: In June a children's band came from Norway. They were aged between 10 and 18 years. In the group there were 57 musicians. Six of the girls were majorettes,they had white fluffy hats and they looked very smart,so did the boys . Our school went to the edge of the playing field where a crowd had gathered. They gave us a concert. One of the tunes that they played was "Swing,Rock and Roll", which won the Eurovision Song Contest this year. The leader of the group, who spoke good English, introduced the music. He explained that this was the last tour for the conductor of the band who had been with them for 10 years.
